com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties

Interface PropertyChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralSettings, MockBall, MockButton, MockCanvas, MockCheckBox, MockComponent, MockContactPicker, MockContainer, MockEmailPicker, MockForm, MockHorizontalArrangement, MockHVArrangement, MockImage, MockImagePicker, MockImageSprite, MockLabel, MockListPicker, MockNonVisibleComponent, MockPasswordTextBox, MockPhoneNumberPicker, MockRadioButton, MockSlider, MockTableArrangement, MockTextBox, MockVerticalArrangement, MockVideoPlayer, MockVisibleComponent, MockWebViewer, Settings, SplashSettings, YoungAndroidSettings, YoungAndroidSettings

    public interface PropertyChangeListener
    Listener interface for receiving property value change events.

    Classes interested in processing property value change events implement this interface, and instances of that class are registered with the EditableProperties in which that class is interested, using EditableProperties.addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener) method. When the property value change event occurs, the listeners' onPropertyChange() methods are invoked.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPropertyChange(String name, String newValue)
      Invoked after the value of a property was changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onPropertyChange

                    String newValue)
        Invoked after the value of a property was changed.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        newValue - new property value
